title: Which is better: homeopathy medicine or ayurvedic medicine?
description: Answer (1 of 48): Homeopathy can eradicate the root cause of the disease and help us in building a stronger immune system. The ingredients used to make homeopathic medicines are purely natural and have no side effects. Many people have opted for homeopathic treatment to cure their illness because...
